scripts.precommit: if git-branch-is release; then yarn -v; else yarn workspace dnb-ui-lib precommit && yarn workspace dnb-design-system-portal precommit; fi
scripts.reset: rm -rf ./node_modules && yarn workspace dnb-ui-lib reset && yarn workspace dnb-design-system-portal reset && yarn install
scripts.build: yarn workspace dnb-ui-lib build && yarn workspace dnb-design-system-portal build
